text: Benoît Lacroix (8 September 1915 - 2 March 2016) was a Canadian theologian, philosopher, and Dominican priest. He was a professor in Medieval studies and historian of the Mediaeval period at the Université de Montréal. He was the author of almost 50 works and a great number of articles.Université de Montréal: Nos pionnières et nos pionniers - Benoît Lacroix He was born in Saint-Michel-de-Bellechasse, Quebec. Lacroix died in Quebec on 2 March 2016 from problems caused by pneumonia.
